page.title: 13SERVICES IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: The Fire Station in the village is a part time Station. That means the firemen have other jobs.When they are at home and their bleeper goes off.Then they rush to the fire station. The Policeman is full time and has not got another job.But sometimes he has a rest day. The garage has got only two pumps and two car lifts.There are about ten people working at the garage and they sell BMX bikes.They have a shop around the corner.They have got spare wheels for cars.They sell tools and they mend cars and bikes. The telephone exchange is only a small telephone exchange but it has lots of phones and wires and about ten telephone vans.There are about twenty people working there.The telephone vans have got tools in the back .
